prod_short_desc: Protect the bank and stop the crooks!
prod_long_desc:
Be part of the action with the LEGO® City police as they protect the bank’s safe and ATM from the crooks and their bulldozer, with a high security truck loaded with accessories, helicopter with searchlight, spinning rotors, plus the crooks’ bulldozer with chains and hooks. Includes five minifigures plus a police dog figure.
Build an entire bank heist scene with a 2-level bank and three buildable vehicles!
Use the crooks’ bulldozer to pull the safe and ATM from the bank walls, then bring in the police helicopter and truck to chase them down and capture them!
Includes female police pilot, male police specialist, female police officer, and 2 crook minifigures, plus a police dog figure and lots of accessories
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Bank is over 6” high, 5” wide, and 2” long. Bulldozer is over 2” high, 4” long, and 2” wide. Helicopter is over 2” high, 6” long, and 5” wide. Police truck is over 3” high, 6” long, and 2” wide
561 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
